          <title>
            <string language="en">Sedimentary rock formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedimentäre Felsenanordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de roche sédimentaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de rocha sedimentary</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιζηματώδης σχηματισμός βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de roca sedimentaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two series illustrating the formation of sedimentary rocks from mountains.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Serien, welche die 
Anordnung der sedimentären Felsen von den Bergen veranschaulichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux séries illustrant la 
formation des roches sédimentaires des montagnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas séries que ilustram a 
formação de rochas sedimentary das montanhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due serie che illustrano la 
formazione delle roccie sedimentarie dalle montagne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο σειρών που επεξηγούν το σχηματισμό των 
ιζηματωδών βράχων από τα βουνά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos series que ilustran la 
formación de rocas sedimentarias de las montañas.</string>
